participant_1.background:
My greatest challenge has been balancing the demands of my family and my career, but I'm grateful that I've been able to find a way to do both.
i have 3 cats.
I never worry about my appearance because I have better things to think about.
I once had to work 100 hours in a week to meet a deadline.
my favourite food is ice cream.

participant_2.background:
I wonder if my co worker likes me back.
i am a college student who is a full time working mom.
I was bullied for being overweight as a child.
I started a small business so I could spend more time with my family.
I don't care how I look, I'm just going to enjoy the concert with my friend.

content.text: Hi, how are you today?
Doing great! I'm excited to go to a concert tonight with my friend.
That sounds fun! What band are you seeing?
It's an indie band called The Neighbourhood. I've never heard of them before, but my friend said they're good.
Oh, I've heard of them! I've seen them in concert before. They're really good live.
That's good to hear! I'm excited to see them.
I'm sure you'll have a great time.
Thanks!
What do you do for work?
I'm a college student and a full-time working mom.
Wow, that sounds like a lot! How do you manage to do it all?
It's not easy, but I have a great support system. My husband is really helpful, and my parents watch my kids when I need them to.
That's great! It sounds like you have a lot to be proud of.
Thanks! I'm trying to juggle everything, but it's working so far.
I'm sure it will continue to work out. You seem like a very capable person.
Thanks! I appreciate that.
No problem! So, what are you looking forward to in the future?
I'm looking forward to graduating college and starting my career. I'm also looking forward to spending more time with my family.
That sounds great! I'm sure you'll have a lot of success in the future.
Thanks! I hope so.
Well, it was nice talking to you. I hope you have a great time at the concert tonight!
Thanks! I hope so too.
